articles.description: Permission for the development was originally refused in August 2021
articles.content:
A small Somerset village is being asked to take "significant levels" of new housing due to local planning policies being seen as "out of date".
Waddeton Park Ltd. applied in January 2021 to build 49… [+4762 chars]
